nodes.title: Make page better adaptable with FunctionComponents
Fixed elasticsearch search error when no extension is published
fix elasticsearch search error when no extension is published
Fixed markup table issue and adapted several styles for readme
Use white-space: 'pre' instead of 'pre-line' for code tags now.
[extension-detail-reviews] adjust the layout for small devices.
Generate new token dialog: Add 'copy to clipboard' button.
[user-settings] make user profile + tokens responsive for small devices.
Items don't fade in slowly anymore, infinite loop  is prevented now
[extension list] adjust the search to look good on mobile.
Added infinite scroller behaviour to extension list
Improve display of non-quadratic extension icons.
code in markup gets wrapped now.
add alt  text to the images.
[💄] a little bit of padding around the avatar menu.
feat: bump to the newer vsce CLI client
feat: Introduce database search in addition to elasticsearch
fix #317: make sure that public id gets persisted
Added exact match search for namespace.name
Add more cache directives to the server #266
don't fail if bundled extension is missing, they are optional
#306 Send CORS headers so vscode can use the API
[ature] add missing allowed headers to fetch web extensions
server: allow every origin to access api endpoint
clarify azure CORS setup for http methods
Set the debounce time for search dynamically
Reverted max-duration to 10m for resources with variable version.
Optimized cache-control max-age for certain fixed resources
[server] added caching to search and storage
Added download terms to page settings object, use in detailed overview
[cli] Skip license input when in a CI
Ignore case when finding default files
Support more cases for readme, changelog and license files #200
Make an ES RestClient available in addition to HighLevelRestClient
Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.4.0 and Elasticsearch 7.9.3
Added localhost port in dev environment
Added localhost port in dev environment
Add `active` flag to extensions and extension versions
Implemented file storage with Azure Blob
fixed css to respect long version lists in admin dashboard
Reject unlicensed extensions in default registry instance
Implemented the extension detail changes tab
Changed footer style, allow expanding the footer
Fixed download button and footer link hover issue
Implemented OAuth login and Publisher Agreement with Eclipse Foundation
Allow lowercase readme and license filenames
More consistent status codes, added 'query' endpoint
Improved performance of search and extension queries
Use separate DB field for public extension ids
Render license links to spdx.org, improved detection
Implemented file storage via Google Cloud
Added localhost port in dev environment
Render footer at the bottom, add info menu
Include Elasticsearch testcontainer for integration test
Moved webui dev app to src
use multistage build to build open-vsx server
Apply sortOrder and sortBy after reload
Adapted backgroound for code blocks in details.
Added 'allVersions' with engines map to search entries
Following VSCode sort order, fix for #126
Several improvements in server and webui
Added DOMPurify and sanitized readme text.
Privileged publishing, info banners for extensions
[user-setiings/tokens] align empty state text to the center.
